text: Vicki is a 1953 American crime drama movie directed by Harry Horner and is based on I Wake Up Screaming by Steve Fisher is a remake of the 1941 movie. It stars Jeanne Crain, Jean Peters, Elliott Reid, Richard Boone, Aaron Spelling, Carl Betz. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:American crime drama movies Category:1953 crime drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Vicki (movie)
